Headline: #87 87thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Western
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 95th and Western: due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 95th and Western: due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 87th, Ashland and 95th : due to, street blockage near 87th/Western..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 87th, Ashland and 95th : due to, street blockage near 87th/Western..

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Cicero due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended at Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and UIC Halsted at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested  between UIC Halsted  and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
